title: Open to view: British country houses
creator_credit: Anthony Gilkison, Rayant Pictures and John Durst
brief_description: Some of the historic castles and houses of Britain. The island castle of St Michael’s Mount in Cornwall; Stokesay Castle in Shropshire; the great house at Chastleton; Chatsworth, where the Dukes of Devonshire have gathered art treasures; Castle Code in Northern Ireland. A visit to Windsor Castle.
